title: Reasonable 1 Bedroom Apt Near Rainbow Beach 7741-51 S. South Shore Dr.
posting_body: Great California style building located next to Lake Michigan's Rainbow Beach and Chicago Park District's recreation facility.
One bedroom with 1 bath apartment currently available for $750.
Stove, refrigerator, air-conditioner, and blinds included.
FREE HEAT and FREE COOKING GAS.
Gated off-street parking for an additional monthly charge.
No Security Deposit -- $350 Non-Refundable Move-In Fee after application is approved.
$40 Non-Refundable Application Fee for credit and background check.
If you would like to schedule an appointment for a viewing, please call
